item.title: [p23] Grindstone
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.

item.title: [p23] Retrofitter Foundry
item.description:
Artifact

{3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry.

{2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

{T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

item.title: [ybro] Patchplate Resolute
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Soldier

When Patchplate Resolute enters or leaves the battlefield, you get a boon with "When you cast your next creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it."

Unearth {1}{W}

item.title: [ybro] Hurkyl's Prodigy
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

When Hurkyl's Prodigy enters the battlefield, create a tapped Powerstone token.

Whenever Hurkyl's Prodigy attacks, you may pay {3}. If you do, Hurkyl's Prodigy can't be blocked this turn and it perpetually gets +2/+0.

item.title: [ybro] Melt Through
item.description:
Instant

Melt Through deals 2 damage to any target. If it's a creature, it perpetually gains "As long as this creature is on the battlefield, damage isn't removed form it during cleanup steps."

item.title: [ybro] Legion of Clay
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control have trample. Whenever one or more nontoken artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1.

item.title: [ybro] Assemble the Team
item.description:
Sorcery

Search the top third of your library, rounded up, for a card. Put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [ybro] Perilous Iteration
item.description:
Sorcery

Seek a card with mana value 2 or less and a card with mana value 3 or greater. Discard those cards at the beginning of your next turn's end step.

item.title: [ybro] Urza's Construction Drone
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

When Urza's Construction Drone enters the battlefield, conjure cards named Urza's Mine, Urza's Power Plant, and Urza's Tower into your library, then shuffle.

Whenever Urza's Construction Drone attacks or dies, seek an Urza's land card.

item.title: [p23] Sword of War and Peace
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of War and Peace deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.

Equip {2}

https://twitter.com/JudgeAcademy/status/1601283276857278464

item.description:
Land

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [dmr] Lieutenant Kirtar
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Bird Soldier

Flying

{1}{W}, Sacrifice Lieutenant Kirtar: Exile target attacking creature.

item.title: [dmr] Legacy Weapon
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent.

If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

item.title: [dmr] Legacy Weapon
item.description:

{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent.

If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

item.title: [dmr] Leaden Fists
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.title: [dmr] Last Chance
item.description:
Sorcery

Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

item.description:

item.title: [dmr] Krosan Restorer
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

{T}: Untap target land.

Threshold — {T}: Untap up to three target lands. Activate only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

item.title: [dmr] Kjeldoran Gargoyle
item.description:
Creature — Gargoyle

Flying, first strike

Whenever Kjeldoran Gargoyle deals damage, you gain that much life.

item.title: [dmr] Kavu Primarch
item.description:
Creature — Kavu

Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [dmr] Kamahl, Fist of Krosa
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Druid

{G}: Target land becomes a 1/1 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

{2}{G}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [dmr] Kamahl, Fist of Krosa
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Druid

{G}: Target land becomes a 1/1 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

{2}{G}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [dmr] Juggernaut
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Juggernaut

Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

item.title: [dmr] Juggernaut
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Juggernaut

Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.

Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

item.title: [dmr] Jolrael, Mwonvuli Recluse
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Druid

Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 green Cat creature token.

{4}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

item.title: [dmr] Jolrael, Mwonvuli Recluse
item.description:

{4}{G}{G}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

item.title: [dmr] Jalum Tome
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
